Hi
I'm Jay.
I build mobile apps.

iPhone, iPad, Mac OS, Apple Watch, Apple TV

Available for hire.

11

Years of experience.

I'm a freelance App developer and I've been building apps for clients for over 11 years in a wide range of sectors including international sports brands, film studios, health, CRM, and not for profit. Based in the middle of the UK, I've worked with clients across the world.

In my spare time I can be seen trekking in the outdoors with my family, working on a pilots license or trying to make any money from Cryptocurrencies.

48

Projects.

Most of the projects I've worked on are bound by NDA's which is how most freelancers work today. I do get a lot of work from recommendations, so my portfolio contains side projects to keep my skills fresh when new iOS feature's come out. I find this way works best and is more beneficial to my clients.

I like to work in a very collaborative and open way, either working solo or part of a team tackling a larger problem. My code is always clean, well documented, and easily read by non technical people, should they want to have a play.

"Great team player"

Certainly more committed than most contractors in the market. More than comfortable in front of and leading client meetings. Would highly recommend.

His interpersonal skills were of great value to the projects progression and he was able to explain technical processes with ease to non-technical stakeholders.

Hire, say Hi.

Guidelines.

Due to Covid-19 I only work remotely and I aim to get back to all enquries within a day.

If you're looking to hire me for a project, please provide any details along with timelines. I charge £450 per day for app development (plus VAT if applicable) and I can't work for profit-share or equity. I also offer support blocks to new and existing clients with a minimum of 2 hours booked per month.
